Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The initial identification of the steps in the hiring process, including the logic behind 'ReceiveApplication,' 'DataCompletenessCheck,' 'SkillAssessment,' 'CulturalFitCheck,' 'ManagerialReview,' and 'FinalDecision,' demonstrates pattern recognition in interpreting the textual description.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Using deductive reasoning to identify that the XOR choice in 'CulturalFitCheck' is where bias is introduced as described in the textual description.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: The approach to simplifying the cultural fit and affiliation check by modeling 'unfair' and 'fair' workflows pragmatically reflects heuristic reasoning.

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: Re-evaluating whether 'ManagerialReview' needs to be integrated as part of a single sequential task with 'CulturalFitCheck' and 'FinalDecision' leading to multiple iterations of thought in the process structure.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Recognizing that the POWL loop model can represent the 'DataCompletenessCheck' and 'RequestMoreInfo' logic accurately as a repeated process.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - NE
Text: Assuming that 'FinalDecision' encapsulates all prior steps' logic (e.g., rejecting applicants early and following sequential tasks), leading to a slightly less structured representation in parts of the reasoning.

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: Revisiting the idea of how SkillAssessment failures are handled in POWL, debating between modeling as a direct rejection activity or incorporating it into FinalDecision logic.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Deciding that the 'Fair Model' must remove the XOR branching that introduces bias and ensure all applicants go through 'StandardCulturalFitCheck.'

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Defining the activities and operators in the POWL model pragmatically to represent both Fair and Unfair models with minimal abstraction while adhering to the process description.
